short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a gateway between Findify and your favourite IDE allowing Findify CI/CD workflow based on GitHub.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BETA - For clarifications and assistance, please email yourfriends@findify.io

Enhanced development workflow for Findify component development allowing version control.

On your Findify powered store, connect the extension with your local environment on your favourite IDE, live reload the preview of your changes and deploy the changes by merging your GIT PRs to main.

(Permission access for Repository needs to be granted and configured by the Findify team)
